auth.login_entries_with_welcoming_msg: Enter your email and password to securely access your account and get your loyalty features.
auth.signUp_entries_with_welcoming_msg: Create a new account to get started and enjoy seamless access to our loyalty features.
auth.forgotPassword_entries_with_welcoming_ms: Enter your email address to receive a reset link and regain access to your account.
auth.resetPassword_entries_with_welcoming_msg: Set strong new password to enhance security and protect your account.

app.scan_NFC_or_QR: Hold your phone near the NFC tag, or scan the QR code if NFC is not supported.
